import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Layout from '../components/Layout'; import { fetchPaymentHistory } from '../services/api'; function PaymentHistoryPage() { const [history, setHistory] = useState([]); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); const [nameOnCard, setNameOnCard] = useState(''); const [cardNumber, setCardNumber] = useState(''); const [expiry, setExpiry] = useState(''); const [cvc, setCvc] = useState(''); const [billingAddress, setBillingAddress] = useState(''); const [saving, setSaving] = useState(false); const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState(''); // card or cash useEffect(() => { fetchPaymentHistory() .then((data) => { setHistory(data); setIsLoading(false); }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Error fetching payment history:', error); setIsLoading(false); }); }, []); if (isLoading) return (

Loading Payment History...

 ); return ( {/* ✅ Simple navigation bar */}
Dashboard Payment Profile
{/* ✅ Payment Form Section */}

Payment & Payback History

Track your charges and recycling credits/paybacks.

Add Payment Details

{ e.preventDefault(); setSaving(true); setTimeout(() => { setSaving(false); alert('Payment submitted successfully (demo).'); }, 700); }} >
{/* ✅ Card Payment Details (shown only if card is selected) */} {paymentMethod === 'card' && ( <>

Card Details

setNameOnCard(e.target.value)} placeholder="Resident User" required />
setCardNumber(e.target.value)} placeholder="4242 4242 4242 4242" required />
setExpiry(e.target.value)} placeholder="MM/YY" required />
setCvc(e.target.value)} placeholder="123" required />
setBillingAddress(e.target.value)} placeholder="123 Main St, City" />
)}
{/* ✅ Payment History Cards */}
{history.length > 0 ? ( history.map((record, idx) => (
{record.type === 'Payback' ? 'Recycling Credit' : record.type} {record.status}
{record.type === 'Payback' ? `+${record.amount.toFixed(2)}` : `-${record.amount.toFixed(2)}`}{' '} USD
{record.date}
)) ) : (
No financial records found.
)}
); } export default PaymentHistoryPage;
